Package controller

Class GameEngine

java.lang.Object
controller.GameEngine
public class GameEngine extends Object
This class serves as the main controller in the MVC model. It manages the interactions between the view, models, and various child controllers. Acting as an intermediary, it facilitates communication between models/controllers and the view.

    GameEngine.CommandListener
    This class extends the GameEngine class and listens to actions triggered by buttons in the view.

    showMap(Boolean p_BooleanForGamePhaseStarted)
    This is a method to show all countries and continents, armies on each country, ownership, and connectivity Map Phase : For Each Continent in Continent List, For each country in that continent, For each neighbor in that country Game Phase : Apart from continent, country and neighbors, it also shows player, thier ownership and their number of armies.

  • Method Details

    • editPlayer

      public String editPlayer(String p_Command, String p_Str) throws Exception
      this Method will take inputs from the user and will add or remove player according to the inputs provided by the user
      Parameters:
      p_Command - The command.
      p_Str - The string.
      Returns:
      A string indicating the number of players added and removed.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs.

    • assignCountries

      public void assignCountries() throws Exception
      This Method will take assign countries from command prompt and will do startup Phase as well as assigning reinforcements to the player.
      Throws:
      Exception - this is user defined exception based on AssignCountries if there are no players assigned then it will throw an exception

    • showAllPlayerWithArmies

      public void showAllPlayerWithArmies()
      Shows all players with their assigned armies.

    • showMap

      public void showMap(Boolean p_BooleanForGamePhaseStarted)
      This is a method to show all countries and continents, armies on each country, ownership, and connectivity
      • Map Phase : For Each Continent in Continent List, For each country in that continent, For each neighbor in that country
      • Game Phase : Apart from continent, country and neighbors, it also shows player, thier ownership and their number of armies.
      Parameters:
      p_BooleanForGamePhaseStarted - takes boolean value to show map for map phase or game phase
